arts.ttl: 60 seconds of chaos shows why Pep Guardiola is giving Man City fans a different kind of transfer rebuild
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola showed why Manchester City are looking for two central defenders in the January transfer window as the Blues beat Salford.

arts.ttl: Man City 8-0 Salford City: James McAtee shows his star quality with hat-trick in FA Cup thrashing of Class of 92' rivals as several Etihad youngsters impress in dominant win
arts.sum: IAN HERBERT AT THE ETIHAD: Perhaps Gary Neville intuited what was coming when the biggest day in his decade as a co-owner of Salford City finally dawned in this FA Cup contest.

arts.ttl: Man City 8-0 Salford City: Highlights, man of the match, stats as McAtee, Doku dazzle in FA Cup slaughter
arts.sum: James McAtee scores a hat-trick and Jeremy Doku produces a man-of-the-match display as Manchester City obliterate Salford City 8-0 in the third round of the FA Cup.

arts.ttl: James McAtee nets hat-trick as Man City thrash neighbours Salford in FA Cup rout
arts.sum: Jeremy Doku, Jack Grealish, Devin Mubama and Nico O’Reilly were also on the scoresheet in an 8-0 win.

arts.ttl: Jack Grealish FINALLY scores for Manchester City after breaking 392-day goal drought in FA Cup clash with Salford City - but star can only conjure up a muted celebration
arts.sum: Jack Grealish finally broke his 392-day goal drought after netting for Man City in their third-round FA Cup clash with Salford.

arts.ttl: Manchester City v Salford City: FA Cup third round – live
arts.sum: Updates from the 5.45pm GMT kick-off at the Etihad Get in touch! Share your thoughts in an email to Rob Read Will Unwin’s preview Salford are third in League Two and optimism is building that they could exit it through the ceiling rather than the floor. Robinson is doing an impressive job with the players at his disposal and the academy is starting to produce players to give hints of an upward curve. The former Oxford manager backed the owners after meeting them just over a year ago to discuss the job. He had so much faith he did not sign a contract for the first seven matches of his reign and he could further repay their decision to hire him by attracting the finance to kickstart their ambitions. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Salford City - FA Cup: Live score, team news and updates as Pep Guardiola leaves fans baffled with team selection for visit of League Two side
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport live blog for the latest live score, team news and updates as Manchester City host League Two side Salford City at the Etihad in the third round of the FA Cup.

arts.ttl: Why Ryan Giggs will be in Salford City's dugout for Man City FA Cup tie
arts.sum: The former Manchester United winger will be in the away dugout for Saturday's fixture, aiding Salford manager Karl Robinson as the League Two outfit attempt to pull off a miraculous upset. Despite being part-owner of fourth-tier Salford, alongside his former 'Class of '92' colleagues, Giggs will be acting as one of the assistants for first-team manager Robinson's on Saturday - a position he has held since October 2024.

arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Salford City LIVE: FA Cup team news and line-ups from unique Manchester derby
arts.sum: The League Two side, who are owned by members of Manchester United’s ‘Class of ‘92’, face City in a Greater Manchester derby

arts.ttl: Ryan Giggs speaks out on Salford City role and reveals whether he will stay in dugout
arts.sum: Manchester United legend Ryan Giggs returned to the dugout with Salford City last year - but the Welshman doesn't how if the arrangement will be a long-term one
